name: quick-feet

effect.black_white: Whenever this Pokémon has a major status ailment, it has 1.5× its Speed. This Pokémon is not affected by the usual Speed cut from paralysis. Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is halved.
effect.black_2_white_2: Whenever this Pokémon has a major status ailment, it has 1.5× its Speed. This Pokémon is not affected by the usual Speed cut from paralysis. Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is halved.

short_effect: Increases Speed to 1.5× with a major status ailment.

flavor_text.black_white: Boosts Speed if there is a status problem.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: Boosts Speed if there is a status problem.
